description: A better version of Agricola for me (less cards to muddle through) - though I kind of miss my stickered discs from the original set. Agricola is the essential backbreaking euro. Can you feed all of your people?...not really, but somehow you do it. I love how hard the choices are in this game and how well the player interaction works in accordance with that. I prefer this to the looser system of Caverna.  *All plays tracked under original version.
